PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-06342015-05-28,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Motor Vehicle Expenses and Benefits 2015)
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (MOTOR VEHICLE EXPENSES AND BENEFITS 2015) in order to ensure the rates and limits remain appropriate and reflect changes in the costs associated with acquiring, financing and operating an automobile for business purposes for 2015.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0122 Publication Date: 2015-06-17
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Motor Vehicle Expenses and Benefits 2015)
precis: Regulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (MOTOR VEHICLE EXPENSES AND BENEFITS 2015) in order to ensure the rates and limits remain appropriate and reflect changes in the costs associated with acquiring, financing and operating an automobile for business purposes for 2015.
